TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Colors extends System.Object

summary.span: 实现一组预定义的颜色。

span.span: Implements a set of predefined colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]颜色名称匹配[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]版本 1.0， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)]颜色名称。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] color names match the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 1.0, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)] color names. 此表示形式基于 UNIX X11 名为颜色值。This representation is based on UNIX X11 named color values. 下图显示每个预定义的颜色、 其名称和其十六进制值。The following image shows each predefined color, its name, and its hexadecimal value. ![预定义颜色](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "预定义颜色")![Predefined colors](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "Predefined colors") 颜色表包括颜色样本、 颜色名称和十六进制值Color Table including a color swatch, the color name, and the hexadecimal value 请参阅各种不同的其他更复杂的方式，您可以添加一个区域后，包括渐变颜色的类 (， ) 或图像 ()。See the class for a variety of other more complex ways you can color an area, including gradients (, ) or images (). ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 不能声明此托管的类中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，但你可以使用其静态属性将中的值分配[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but you can use its static properties to assign values in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
